amendment.description: To repeal the 2001 Authorization for Use of Military Force.

action.text: Amendment SA 2 under the order of 3/22/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 9 - 86. Record Vote Number: 65.
Amendment SA 2 proposed by Senator Paul. (consideration: CR S902) To repeal the 2001 Authorization for Use of Military Force.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2 proposed by Senator Paul.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2 under the order of 3/22/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 9 - 86. Record Vote Number: 65.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2 under the order of 3/22/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 9 - 86. Record Vote Number: 65.
